job.title: Lead Software Engineer (Python) ($175-225k), 100% remote
job.description:
Lead Software Engineer, (Python), ($175-225k), 100% remote.   ABOUT US:  - Fast-Growing, Disruptive SaaS in Fintech,   
  - Silicon Valley Startup, $120M Series-B, Profitable,   
  - Proven Industry Veteran Execs with very successful exits   
  - Excellent Pay, Benefits, Equity, 100% remote, telecommute.   
   ABOUT YOU:  - 10+ years of Professional Backend Software Engineering   
  - Strong Python, API Development, REST, AWS   
  - Distributed Systems, Highly Scalable Systems,   
  - Excellent Collaboration skills, Team Lead skills   
  - Excited to build our core Payments Platform eventually used by millions   
   Nice to have:  - High traffic Backend Development for Consumer Web (nice to have)   
  - Startup experience (nice to have)   
  - Payments Processing experience
